titleStmt.title: An account of the late horrid conspiracy to depose Their present Majesties, K. William and Q. Mary, to bring in the French and the late King James, and ruine the city of London ... also, some brief reflections on the trials of the Lord Preston, Major Ashton, and Mr. Elliot, who were chiefly concern'd therein, and found guilty / by a gentleman who was present at their trials.
titleStmt.author: Gentleman who was present at their trials.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
